EmailTemplate.description: This template is used to send out the user guide and cheat sheet document to the NSC partner portal users using the engineer and equipment functions.
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Portal - Eng & Eqp User Guide
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR SalesCentral Partner Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
Welcome to the NCR SalesCentral Partner Portal. This communication is being sent to provide the user guide that will assist with the use of NSC.
Please use the following URL to connect to your NCR SalesCentral Partner Portal: http://nscportal.ncr.com
If you have questions or need assistance please contact your NCR Partner Manager or email us at interact.operations@ncr.com.
Thanks, NCR Channel Operations Team
